name: Enigma (1998)
description: Enigma (エニグマ) is a 1998 Japanese video game for the Sony PlayStation. It was developed by Omega Force and published by Koei. It is a third person adventure title that includes elements from fighting games which draws influence from Resident Evil. Set in 1920, the game features three playable characters from England, Japan, and America, who travel the world solving puzzles in various ruins and temples. The game was never released outside of Japan.
